description.general.borderOpacity: Opacity of decoration border in __```%```__. __```1```__ is no opacity.
description.general.backgroundOpacity: Opacity of background color of selection in __```%```__. __```1```__ is no opacity.
description.statusText.color:
Change the Inline Status Text color. 

Must be in format of hex color representation as __```#RRGGBB```__.
description.statusText.backgroundColor:
Change the Inline Status Text background color. 

Must be in format of hex color representation as __```#RRGGBB```__, __```null```__ or __```""```__ (No background).
description.statusText.opacity: Opacity of background color of selection in __```%```__. __```1```__ is no opacity.
description.statusText.cursorOnlyText:
Status Text for _'Cursor Only Selection'_. 
| Placeholder | Description |
| ---------------: | ------- |
| __```${col}```__ | Current position of cursor (as on status bar) |
| __```${zCol}```__ | Count of characters in line (Zero based)|
| __```${ln}```__ | Current line number | 

Example: `< Editing ... At (idx ${zCol}, zero-based)`
description.statusText.singleLineText:
Status Text for _'Single Line Selection'_. 
| Placeholder | Description |
| ---------------: | ------- |
| __```${char}```__ | Character count of selection |
| __```${ln}```__ | Current line number |
 

Example: `< Selection ... Of (${char} Characters)`
description.statusText.multiLineCursorTe:
Status Text for _'Multi Line Selection (Active Cursor)'_. 
| Placeholder | Description |
| ---------------: | ------- |
| __```${ln}```__ | Selection cursor line number |
| __```${lc}```__ | Line count of selection |
| __```${char}```__ | Character count of selection | 

Example: `< Selection Cursor ... Of (${lc} Lines, ${char} Characters, Indent/EOL Ignored)`
description.statusText.multiLineAnchorTe:
Status Text for _'Multi Line Selection (Anchor)'_. 
| Placeholder | Description |
| ---------------: | ------- |
| __```${ln}```__ | Selection anchor line number |
| __```${lc}```__ | Line count of selection |
| __```${char}```__ | Character count of selection |

Example: `< Selection Anchor ... Of (${lc} Lines, ${char} Characters, Indent/EOL Ignored)`
description.statusText.multiCursorText:
Status Text for _'Multi Cursor Selection'_. 
| Placeholder | Description |
| ---------------: | ------- |
| __```${nth}```__ | Position of selection |
| __```${count}```__ | Count of selection |
| __```${lc}```__ | Total line count of selection |
| __```${ln}```__ | Selection line number of last line |
| __```${char}```__ | Total character count of selection | 

Example: `< Multi Selection ... Of (${nth} of ${count}, with Total ${lc} Lines ${char} Characters)`
